definition: to choose and use/to adopt (a decision)
to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
to select/to choose/to pick over/to pick out/to differentiate/to eliminate/also pr. [zhai2]

sentences.english: The ability of affective perspective-taking predicted the development of emotion regulation.
sentences.chinese: 幼兒的情緒觀點採擇能力能夠預測情緒調節的發展。
